PC Number: 2011-0285

Date: 2011-03-03

Whereas the Honourable Donald M. Cooper, a Judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling him from the due execution of his office and has tendered his resignation;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, hereby

 

(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Donald M. Cooper; and

 

(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1)(c) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Donald M. Cooper an annuity of $180,933.33, to continue during his life.


Attendu que l’honorable Donald M. Cooper, juge de la Cour suprême des Territoires du Nord-Ouest, atteint d’une infirmité permanente l’empêchant d’accomplir utilement les devoirs de sa charge, a donné sa démission,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil :

 

a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Donald M. Cooper;

 

b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1)c) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Donald M. Cooper, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 180 933,33 $.
